name: bj-biorfi

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, wo(w1, w0))
-| wn(w1)
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(w0, wo(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, wo(w1, w0))
-| wn(w1)
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(w0, wo(w1, w0)))

comment: This should be labeled "biorfi" while the current ~ biorfi should be labeled "biorfri". The dual of ~ biorf is not ~ biantr but ~ iba (and ~ ibar ). So there should also be a "biorfr". (Note that these four statements can actually be strengthened to biconditionals.) (Contributed by BJ, 26-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
